description: Thick leather body armor that has been hardened via chemical treatment.  Light and strong.
Leg and body armor made from the exoskeletons of insects.
Leg and body armor crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle.
Thick body armor made from furs.
Thick leather body armor.  Light and comfortable.
A suit of Gothic plate armor.
A suit of Gothic plate armor.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion and the leather straps are tattered.
A light suit of plate armor with a 2 mm thick chestpiece.  This one has been made with mild steel.

name.str: XL mild steel 2 mm plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2 mm thick chestpiece.  Made with tougher medium steel, this suit offers solid protection.

name.str: XL mild steel 2 mm plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2 mm thick chestpiece.  Made with high carbon steel offering excellent protection.

name.str: XL high steel 2 mm plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2 mm thick chestpiece.  The mild steel has been case hardened, offering superior protection.

name.str: XL case hardened 2 mm plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2 mm thick chestpiece.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
A suit of plate armor with a 4 mm thick chestpiece.  This one has been made with mild steel.

name.str: XL mild steel 4 mm plate armor

description: A suit of plate armor with a 4 mm thick chestpiece.  Made with tougher medium steel, this suit offers solid protection.

description: A suit of plate armor with a 4 mm thick chestpiece.  The mild steel has been case hardened, offering superior protection.

description: A suit of plate armor with a 4 mm thick chestpiece.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
A heavy suit of plate armor with a 6 mm thick chestpiece.  This one has been made with mild steel.

name.str: XL mild steel 6 mm plate armor

description: A heavy suit of plate armor with a 6 mm thick chestpiece.  Made with tougher medium steel, this suit offers solid protection.

description: A heavy suit of plate armor with a 6 mm thick chestpiece.  Made with high carbon steel offering excellent protection.

description: A heavy suit of plate armor with a 6 mm thick chestpiece.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
Thick leather body armor that has been reinforced with strategically-placed metal plates.
An extremely heavy suit of ornamental armor.
An extremely heavy suit of ornamental armor.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion and the leather straps are tattered.
Black plastic body armor plates used by riot police officers, back when they were just riots.  The word POLICE is emblazoned across the front.
An ornamental suit of Japanese samurai armor.
A suit of armor made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.
A suit of armor made from thick chunks of rubber tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

A white suit commonly worn by professional beekeepers with straps on your ankles and wrists to prevent bees from flying in.  It's not a very tough fabric, but it's lightweight and has plenty of storage thanks to a chest pocket.

A fully customized chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  The shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with straps and combined with a gambeson to deal with uneven weight distribution, cold environments and to allow them to be used separately.

A fully customized chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  The shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with straps and combined with a kevlar gambeson to deal with uneven weight distribution, cold environments and to allow them to be used separately.

A fully customized chainmail suit.  The coif, shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with straps and combined with a gambeson to deal with uneven weight distribution, cold environments and to allow them to be used separately.

A fully customized chainmail suit.  The shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with straps and combined with a kevlar gambeson to deal with uneven weight distribution, cold environments and to allow them to be used separately.
A fully customized chainmail suit that can be worn over your normal clothing.  The suit is conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.
A simple hazardous materials handling suit.  Though somewhat restrictive and fragile, wearing it will provide excellent protection against ambient radiation.
A flame-resistant whole-body garment worn by firefighters as protection against extreme heat.  It requires a separate gas mask for full protection against smoke.

A thick jacket of quilted fabric, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  Or worn on its own, if you can't afford proper armor.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

description: A thick vest of quilted fabric, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  This one has had its sleeves removed.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

description: A thick jacket of quilted fabric, loosened to be worn as outer armor.  Use it to wear it tighter and be able to put proper armor over it.

use_action.msg: You adjust your gambeson a bit tighter.

description: A thick jacket of quilted fabric, loosened to be worn as outer armor.  Use it to wear it tighter and be able to put proper armor over it.

use_action.msg: You adjust your gambeson vest a bit tighter.

description: Thick pants made of quilted fabric, meant to be worn alongside a gambeson under or without armor.

A thick jacket of quilted fabric, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  This one incorporates Kevlar layers added for better protection.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

description: A thick vest of quilted fabric, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  This one incorporates Kevlar layers added for better protection.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

use_action.msg: You adjust your kevlar gambeson a bit tighter.

use_action.msg: You adjust your kevlar gambeson a bit tighter.

You loosen your %s.

name.str_pl: pairs of XL Kevlar arming pants

use_action.msg: You adjust your XL kevlar gambeson a bit tighter.

description: An impermeable whole-body garment worn as protection against hazardous materials.  Restrictive and fragile, wearing it will provide complete protection against ambient radiation.  It requires a separate gas mask for full protection.
A snug body suit made from thin and lightweight Nomex fire-resistant fabric.  Tough yet breathable, it is light and comfortable to wear under clothing.

A lightweight environmental suit worn by Hub personnel in their rare forays aboveground.  Colored brown and blue, the white seal of Hub 01 is embroidered on both of its upper arms.  It requires a separate gas mask for full protection.

A single-piece brown and orange environmental suit, tailored in a way that slightly recalls a military flight suit.  The letters "X.E.D.R.A" are inscribed on its back, and a white shoulder patch on the right arm shows an arrow reaching within rings of concentric circles.

The WebbStar moisture retention suit utilizes advanced technology to prevent up to 30% of moisture loss through perspiration.  The suit is powered by the micro-motions of the body, especially breathing and walking motions.  Because of this, your walking speed is impaired while wearing it.
A full-body cotton suit.  Makes the apocalypse a truly gentlemanly experience.

//: This is well within the pricing structure I found for ballistic vest, shins, and LBE.  LEO gear ain't cheap.
description: A suit of black armour plating covering the vital parts of the chest, arms, and legs.  The word SWAT is emblazoned across the back.
A thick leather body suit made for protection while riding motorcycles.  Light and very comfortable.
A sage-green US military flight suit.  It has various insignia embroidered onto it.

A military officer's dress uniform from before the Cataclysm, complete with rank and ribbons.  Just looking at it gives you an air of authority.  Perhaps not the most practical military wear, but a very stylish option.
A sage-green US military flight suit.  It has various insignia embroidered onto it.
